Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2014 10:57PM Raebae wrote: I'm new to this site.  I just had surgery (mastectomy) for breast cancer and am recovering.   In the past (51 now) I have been in this same situation with living in fear and the unknown.  It actually took me 4 years to get through it all...but I did it.  I am still here.  I am stronger than I have ever been.  I hope everything turns out well for you.  This forum, so far, seems to be a wonderful source of inspiration, hope, and strength.  I am grateful it is here.
Posts.Title: Where I'm at...just needing a little support Nikkito Ddkath70
